lines.text: Harry, your loyalty was an accusation. Blame someone else.
At my age, I need an hour in the bathroom in the morning! And there's always one of them skinny, titless mannequins in there fluffing up her hair.
You never said we'd have Bang-fucking-kok in the hallway!
Excuse me, we are from Bom-fucking-bay!
We're broke, we're desperate, we're hopeless... The fag doesn't pay, the Shit doesn't pay...
At least I'm "the Shit." You're just A shit.
My Heart? Home is where the heart is, and I've lost my home.
